# fontSize

**Instance Property**

The font size for rendering a book.

## Declaration

```swift
var fontSize: some AssistantSchemas.Enum { get }
```

## Overview

Use Swift macros that generate additional properties and add protocol conformance for your app enum implementation. The following example shows an app enum that conforms to the `.books.fontSize` schema:

```swift
@AppEnum(schema: .books.fontSize)
enum BookFontSize: AppEnum {
    case `default`

    static var caseDisplayRepresentations: [BookFontSize: AppIntents.DisplayRepresentation] = [
        .`default`: "Default",
    ]
}
```

For more information about the `.books` app intent domain, see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/Making-ebook-actions-available-to-siri-and-apple-intelligence]. For general information about app intent domains, see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/Integrating-actions-with-siri-and-apple-intelligence].
